flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: I had a lot of random rolls of overdue film, but I didn't want to throw them out. I had a bunch of Make magazines, which I always loved to read, and they gave me a bit of inspiration. Why not build a flashlight out of the film? With that in mind, I created a few little miniature flashlights. I recorded it all, and posted it to Make, so you could make one yourself too.
guide.introduction_rendered: I had a lot of random rolls of overdue film, but I didn't want to throw them out. I had a bunch of Make magazines, which I always loved to read, and they gave me a bit of inspiration. Why not build a flashlight out of the film? With that in mind, I created a few little miniature flashlights. I recorded it all, and posted it to Make, so you could make one yourself too.
guide.summary: Build a miniature LED flashlight out of a roll of film
guide.title: LED Filmlight
